title: Characterization of aroma and aroma-active compounds of black carrot (Daucus carota L. ssp. sativus var. atrorubens Alef.) pomace by aroma extract dilution analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15
